sql: SELECT MIN(k.keyword) AS movie_keyword, MIN(n.name) AS actor_name, MIN(t.title) AS marvel_movie FROM cast_info AS ci, keyword AS k, movie_keyword AS mk, name AS n, title AS t WHERE k.keyword = 'marvel-cinematic-universe' AND n.name LIKE '%Downey%Robert%' AND t.production_year > 2014 AND k.id = mk.keyword_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND ci.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND n.id = ci.person_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(k mk n t ci)
 HashJoin(n t ci)
 HashJoin(t ci)
 HashJoin(k mk)
 BitmapScan(k)
 SeqScan(mk)
 BitmapScan(n)
 BitmapScan(t)
 BitmapScan(ci)
 Leading(((k mk) (n (t ci)))) */
